name: Farkle Ultimate
description:
One of the classics, re-invented for your favorite device.

Farkle is a highly addictive roll-the-dice game for your iPad/iPhone.

Simple, intuitive and massively fun, Farkle is easy to learn, but difficult to master. Constantly providing new challenges, it's crisp design will allow you to enjoy yourself for hours, over and over again. It's time you show your friends that they are running out of luck!

The free version of the game offers the following features:

• Crisp graphics and sounds effects
• Left and right hand user support
• Local multiplayer mode
• Game instructions

ATTRIBUTIONS:
Music loops courtesy of PlayOnLoop.com
